Etsy API Review

11 Jun 2011

Etsy's mission is to enable people to make a living making things, and to reconnect makers with buyers .

Ety's vision is to build a new economy and present a better choice.

Etsy provides a RESTful API with JSON responses, and uses oAuth for authentication.
